name: Red-Eyes Pendulum Dragoon
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Omni" monster from your Deck to the GY, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it, and if it was a monster, this card gains ATK equal to that monster's original ATK until the end of this turn. If this card battles, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Omni" monster from your GY or destroy 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; negate the activation of a card or effect, and if you do, destroy that card. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can place it in your Pendulum Zone.
pendulum_text: You can target 1 "Omni" monster in your GY or face-up in your Extra Deck; add it to your hand. Then, you can destroy this card and Special Summon 1 Level 7 or higher DARK "Omni" monster from your hand. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1 card in your Pendulum Zone; negate the activation of a card or effect, and if you do, destroy it. If you have another "Omni" Pendulum Monster in your other Pendulum Zone this card has its Pendulum Scale decreased by 1. You can only use each Pendulum Effect of "Red-Eyes Omni Dragoon" once per turn.
